strings.schematron.title: AAP
strings.appraisalSectionRequired: Appraisal section has to be defined when AAP keyword is used.
strings.notAppraisalSectionRequired: AAP keyword is not used or appraisal section is defined.
strings.reasonForArchivalValuePresence: Test presence or absence of reasonForArchivalValue field
strings.cantSetManyTopicsWhenOfficalAndAAP: Only one topic category is allowed when using keywords "AAP" and "official geodata.
strings.notCantSetManyTopicsWhenOfficalAndAAP: Either this metadata is not both official and AAP, or it does not relate to many topics.
